qa.name: Alex
qa.appearance: Rugged, with a leather jacket and a satchel

hf.name: Sophia
hf.appearance: Petite, with glasses and a ponytail

tr.name: Old Man Jenkins
tr.essence: Mysterious caretaker of the abandoned house
tr.appearance: Wizened, with a long white beard

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did we know, the decrepit walls held secrets beyond our wildest dreams.
json_to_edit.description: A team of adventurers explores an abandoned house, uncovering a hidden treasure.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with shafts of sunlight through broken windows
json_to_edit.name: Hidden Treasure
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex, Sophia, and Old Man Jenkins discover a valuable artifact in an abandoned house.

qa.action: The abandoned Victorian mansion looms ominously against a gray sky.

hf.action: Alex and Sophia cautiously enter the dilapidated foyer, dust swirling around them.

tr.action: Old Man Jenkins emerges from the shadows, startling the adventurers.

xc.action: Alex's eyes widen as he notices a strange pattern on the wallpaper.

ka.action: Sophia carefully peels back the wallpaper, revealing a hidden door.

fn.action: The trio enters a secret room filled with antique furniture and mysterious artifacts.

af.action: Old Man Jenkins pulls a dusty cloth off a peculiar object.

qo.action: The group gathers around a golden statuette, its jeweled eyes glinting in the dim light.

fp.action: Alex holds up the statuette as sunlight suddenly breaks through the clouds, illuminating the room.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.description: A team of adventurers explores an abandoned house, uncovering a hidden treasure.

updated_json.name: Hidden Treasure

qa.action: The abandoned Victorian mansion looms ominously against a gray sky.

hf.action: Alex and Sophia cautiously enter the dilapidated foyer, dust swirling around them.

tr.action: Old Man Jenkins emerges from the shadows, startling the adventurers.

zx.action: The trio exchange wary glances, silently deciding whether to trust each other.

xc.action: Alex's eyes widen as he notices a strange pattern on the wallpaper.

ka.action: Sophia carefully peels back the wallpaper, revealing a hidden door.

fn.action: The trio enters a secret room filled with antique furniture and mysterious artifacts.

wy.action: They rummage through old trunks and shelves, searching for clues about the hidden treasure.

af.action: Old Man Jenkins pulls a dusty cloth off a peculiar object.

qo.action: The group gathers around a golden statuette, its jeweled eyes glinting in the dim light.

fp.action: Alex holds up the statuette as sunlight suddenly breaks through the clouds, illuminating the room.

lm.action: The adventurers' expressions shift from triumph to concern as they hear someone approaching the hidden room.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene, inserting them after every three existing shots. this will increase the total number of shots from 9 to 12. we'll create new shots that fit the scene's atmosphere and continue the story's progression. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and add the new shots to the "shots" dictionary, updating the "list_display_order" accordingly. the new shots will be creative and consistent with the existing scene, maintaining the mood and advancing the plot.

value.action: The trio exchange wary glances, silently deciding whether to trust each other.
They rummage through old trunks and shelves, searching for clues about the hidden treasure.
The adventurers' expressions shift from triumph to concern as they hear someone approaching the hidden room.
